title: T206 Newspaper Ads *Old Mill, Hindu* full sheets
author: Brass23

posts.post_title: T206 Newspaper Ads *Old Mill, Hindu* full sheets
posts.post_content:
Is anybody interested in purchasing my collection of newspaper ads depicting our great T206 cards?

I have The Daily Picayune from New Orleans, The Augusta Herald from Georgia, The Constitution from Atlanta, GA, The Virginian-Pilot 

5 different old mill ads, 1 duplicate
4 half page Hindu Ads, 2 of which are in complete newspapers from the Daily Picayune in New Orleans

Whether you are interested in a unique gift for the holidays or just want that missing piece of your T206 collection, email me and I will get back to you as soon as I can with a scan.

Please specify when you email:

Hindu
   large elephant and pack of cigarettes showing cards $150
   3 small elephants with 2 cards $150
   elephant peeks head over ad (piece of tape w. newspaper) $220
   elephant peeks head over ad (complete newspaper) $400

Old Mill
   farmer on a horse $95
   man/woman playing tennis $95
   2 men and woman smoking x2 $95/per
   man woman cooking and smoking $95
   at the horse race track $100

Shipping will be quoted after purchase. Thanks for looking ~Doug
I will probably send to eBay if no interest but will be as a full set for $1600

Hello -

I want the ad that features Bill Bernhard and Carey (2 Southern leaguers)cards with 3 elephants at the top or any ad featuring Bernhard  (See both ads i have posted):

 If you own this ad, I will take it - you can send scans to [url]jeremyj70@comcast.net[/url]


PM/Email sent
Thanks - JJ
